verses.verse: An Elder <S%G4245><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Sharply Rebuke, <S%G1969><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Exhort <S%G3870><s%> Him As <S%G5613><s%> A Father; <S%G3962><s%> Younger Men <S%G3501><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Brethren; <S%G80><s%>
Elder <S%G4245><s%> Women As <S%G5613><s%> Mothers; <S%G3384><s%> Younger <S%G3501><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Sisters, <S%G79><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Purity. <S%G47><s%>
Widows <S%G5503><s%> Honour <S%G5091><s%> That Are <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3689><s%> Widows; <S%G5503><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Widow <S%G5503><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Descendants <S%G1549><s%> Have, <S%G2192><s%> Let Them Learn <S%G3129><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As To Their Own <S%G2398><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> To Be Pious, <S%G2151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Recompense <S%G287><s%> To Render <S%G591><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Their Parents; <S%G4269><s%> <S%G5124><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Acceptable <S%G587><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now She Who Is <S%G1161><s%> Indeed <S%G3689><s%> A Widow, <S%G5503><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left Alone, <S%G3443><s%> Has Her Hope <S%G1679><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Continues <S%G4357><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Supplications <S%G1162><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prayers <S%G4335><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day. <S%G2250><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But She That <S%G1161><s%> Lives In Self Gratification, <S%G4684><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Is Dead. <S%G2348><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Charge, <S%G3853><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Irreproachable <S%G423><s%> They May Be. <S%G5600><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Specially His <S%G3122><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Household <S%G3609><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Provide For, <S%G4306><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> He Has Denied <S%G720><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Than An Unbeliever <S%G571><s%> Worse. <S%G5501><s%>

A Widow <S%G5503><s%> Let Be Put On The List <S%G2639><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Less <S%G1640><s%> Than Years <S%G2094><s%> Sixty <S%G1835><s%> Being, <S%G1096><s%> Of One <S%G1520><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> Wife, <S%G1135><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Being Borne Witness To, <S%G3140><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> She Brought Up Children, <S%G5044><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> She Entertained Strangers, <S%G3580><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> She Washed, <S%G3538><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> To The Oppressed <S%G2346><s%> She Imparted Relief, <S%G1884><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> She Followed After. <S%G1872><s%>

<S%G3501><s%> But Younger <S%G1161><s%> Widows <S%G5503><s%> Refuse; <S%G3868><s%> <S%G3752><s%> For When <S%G1063><s%> They May Have Grown Wanton Against <S%G2691><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To Marry <S%G1060><s%> They Wish, <S%G2309><s%>
Having <S%G2192><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Because Their <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> They Cast Off. <S%G114><s%>

<S%G260><s%> And Withal <S%G1161><s%> Also To Be <S%G2532><s%> Idle <S%G692><s%> They Learn, <S%G3129><s%> Going About To <S%G4022><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Houses; <S%G3614><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3440><s%> And Not Only <S%G1161><s%> Idle, <S%G692><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Tattlers <S%G5397><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Busy Bodies, <S%G4021><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> Things They <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ought Not. <S%G1163><s%>

I Will <S%G1014><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Younger Ones <S%G3501><s%> To Marry, <S%G1060><s%> To Bear Children, <S%G5041><s%> To Rule The House, <S%G3616><s%> No <S%G3367><s%> Occasion <S%G874><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Adversary <S%G480><s%> Of Reproach <S%G3059><s%> On Account. <S%G5484><s%>
<S%G2235><s%> For Already <S%G1063><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Are Turned Aside <S%G1624><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Believing Man <S%G4103><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Believing Woman <S%G4103><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Widows, <S%G5503><s%> Let Him Impart Relief <S%G1884><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Let Be Burdened <S%G916><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3689><s%> Widows <S%G5503><s%> It May Impart Relief. <S%G1884><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Who Take The Lead <S%G4291><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of Double <S%G1362><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> Let Be Counted Worthy, <S%G515><s%> Specially <S%G3122><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Labouring <S%G2872><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teaching; <S%G1319><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For Says <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture, <S%G1124><s%> An Ox <S%G1016><s%> Treading Out Corn <S%G248><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Thou Shalt Muzzle, <S%G5392><s%> And, <S%G2532><s%> Worthy Is <S%G514><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Workman <S%G2040><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3408><s%> Of His Hire. <S%G846><s%>

Against <S%G2596><s%> An Elder <S%G4245><s%> An Accusation <S%G2724><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3858><s%> Receive Not <S%G1622><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> On The Testimony Of <S%G1909><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

Those That <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G264><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Convict, <S%G1651><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> May Have. <S%G2192><s%>

I Earnestly Testify <S%G1263><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elect <S%G1588><s%> Angels, <S%G32><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Thou Shouldest Keep, <S%G5442><s%> Apart From <S%G5565><s%> Prejudice, <S%G4299><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> By <S%G2596><s%> Partiality. <S%G4346><s%>

Hands <S%G5495><s%> Quickly <S%G5030><s%> On No One <S%G3367><s%> Lay, <S%G2007><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Share <S%G2841><s%> In Sins <S%G266><s%> Of Others. <S%G245><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Pure <S%G53><s%> Keep. <S%G5083><s%>

No Longer <S%G3371><s%> Drink Water, <S%G5202><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> A Little <S%G3641><s%> Use <S%G5530><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4751><s%> Thy Stomach <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Frequent <S%G4437><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Infirmities. <S%G769><s%>

Of Some <S%G5100><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Manifest <S%G4271><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> Going Before <S%G4254><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Judgment; <S%G2920><s%> <S%G5100><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They Follow After. <S%G1872><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G5615><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Manifest <S%G4271><s%> Are, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Otherwise <S%G247><s%> Are, <S%G2192><s%> Be Hid <S%G2928><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Cannot. <S%G1410><s%>
